oracle.name: Wargames*
oracle.contents:
If DEFCON is 2, you may award the enemy 6 VP.

If you do, the game ends. The side with more VP wins.

printed.name: Wargames*
printed.contents: If DEFCON Status 2, you may immediately end the game (without Final Scoring Phase) after giving opponent 6 VPs.

oracle.name: Solidarity*
oracle.contents:
Place 3 USA influence in `Poland`.

If `068-M John Paul II Elected Pope` is not ongoing, this card instead does nothing.

printed.name: Solidarity*
printed.contents:
*Playable as an event only if 'John Paul II Elected Pope' is in effect.*

Add 3 US Influence in Poland.

oracle.name: Iran-Iraq War*
oracle.contents:
Gain 2 military operations.

Choose `Iran` or `Iraq`.

Roll a die and subtract 1 for each enemy-controlled country adjacent to the chosen country. If the result is 4 or greater, gain 2 VP, remove all enemy influence from the chosen country, and place friendly influence there equal to the amount removed.

printed.name: Iran-Iraq War*
printed.contents:
Iran or Iraq invades the other (player's choice). Roll one die and subtract 1 for every opponent-controlled country adjacent to target of invasion. Player Victory on modified die roll of 4-6. Player adds 2 to Military Ops Track.

**Effects of Victory:** Player gains 2 VP and replaces opponent's Influence in target country with his own.

oracle.name: Defectors
oracle.contents:
If this card is a headline, it is valued above any other card and has the text "discard the USSR headline."

If this card is played by USSR in an action round, it has the text "award USA 1 VP."

printed.name: Defectors
printed.contents:
Play in Headline Phase to cancel USSR Headline event, including Scoring Card. Canceled card returns to Discard Pile.

If *Defectors* played by USSR during Soviet action round, US gains 1 VP (unless played on the Space Race).

oracle.name: The Cambridge Five
oracle.contents:
If it is the Late War, this card does nothing.

Otherwise, USA reveals all scoring cards in their hand. USSR places 1 influence in a country in a region named on a card revealed this way.

printed.name: The Cambridge Five
printed.contents: The US player exposes all scoring cards in their hand. The USSR player may then add 1 Influence in any single region named on one of these scoring cards (USSR choice). Cannot be played as an event in Late War.

oracle.name: Special Relationship
oracle.contents:
If the `United Kingdom` is not USA-controlled, this card does nothing.

Otherwise, perform one (USA's choice):
* Place 1 USA influence in any country adjacent to the `United Kingdom`.
* If `021-E NATO` is in effect, place 2 USA influence in any country in `Western Europe` and award USA 2 VP.

printed.name: Special Relationship
printed.contents:
If US is US controlled but NATO is not in effect, US adds 1 Influence to any country adjacent to the UK.

If UK is US controlled and NATO is in effect, US adds 2 Influence to any Western European country and gains 2 VPs.

oracle.name: NORAD*
oracle.contents:
*Ongoing* — After either side completes an action round, if DEFCON became 2 during that action round, USA may place 1 influence in any country containing USA influence.

*(`042-M Quagmire` ends this event.)*

printed.name: NORAD*
printed.contents: If the US controls Canada, the US may place 1 Influence in any country already containing US Influence at the conclusion of any Action Round in which the DEFCON marker moves to the '2' box. This event canceled by *#42 Quagmire*.

oracle.name: Che
oracle.contents:
USSR may launch a coup in a non-battleground country in `Central America`, `South America`, or `Africa` using this card.

If any USA influence is removed this way, USSR may launch a coup in a different non-battleground country in `Central America`, `South America`, or `Africa` using this card.

printed.name: Che
printed.contents:
USSR may immediately make a Coup attempt using this card's Operations value against a non-battleground country in Central America, South America, or Africa.

If the Coup removes any US Influence, USSR may make a second Coup attempt against a different target under the same restrictions.

oracle.name: Our Man in Tehran
oracle.contents:
If USA controls any country in the `Middle East`, USA looks at the top 5 cards of the draw pile. USA may discard any of these cards.

If any card seen in this way was not discarded, shuffle the draw pile.

printed.name: Our Man in Tehran
printed.contents: If the US controls at least one Middle East country, the US player draws the top 5 cards from the draw pile. They may reveal and then discard any or all of these drawn cards without triggering the Event. Any remaining drawn cards are returned to the draw deck, and it is reshuffled.

oracle.name: Yuri and Samantha*
oracle.contents: Until end of turn, after USA launches a coup, award USSR 1 VP.

printed.name: Yuri and Samantha*
printed.contents: USSR receives 1 VP for each US coup attempt made for the remainder of the current turn.

oracle.name: AWACS Sale to Saudis*
oracle.contents:
Place 2 USA influence in `Saudi Arabia`.

*Ongoing* — `065-M Muslim Revolution` does nothing.

printed.name: AWACS Sale to Saudis*
printed.contents: US receives 2 Influence in Saudi Arabia. Muslim Revolution may no longer be played as an event.

oracle.name: Asia Scoring
oracle.contents: Score `Asia`.

oracle.name: Europe Scoring
oracle.contents: Score `Europe`.

oracle.name: Middle East Scoring
oracle.contents: Score the `Middle East`.

oracle.name: "Duck and Cover" to Be Shown to School Children
oracle.contents:
Decrement DEFCON.

Award USA VP equal to five minus DEFCON.

printed.name: Duck and Cover
printed.contents:
Degrade DEFCON one level.

Then US player earns VPs equal to 5 minus current DEFCON level.

oracle.name: Soviet Announces a 5-Year Plan
oracle.contents:
USSR chooses a card in its hand at random and discards it.

If that card is USA-aligned, USA resolves it.

printed.name: Five-Year Plan
printed.contents: USSR player must randomly dicard one card. If the card is a US associated Event, the Event occurs immeditely. If the card is a USSR associated Event or an Event applicable to both players, then the card must be discarded without triggering the Event.

oracle.name: The China Card
oracle.contents:
Conduct operations with this card. This card's operations value is 1 greater if all its operations are conducted in `Asia`.

The enemy now holds this card. Turn it facedown.

When USA resolves this card, end `035-E Formosan Resolution\*`.

*(This card is never in a side's hand and cannot be discarded.)*

printed.name: The China Card
printed.contents:
***Begins the game with the USSR player.***

+1 Operations value when all points are used in Asia. Pass to opponent after play.

+1 VP for the player holding this card at the end of Turn 10.

*Cancels effect of 'Formosan Resolution' if this card is played by the US player.*

oracle.name: Socialist Governments
oracle.contents:
Remove up to 3 USA influence from `Western Europe`. Do not remove more than 2 from any single country.

*(This card instead does nothing during `083-L The Iron Lady`.)*

printed.name: Socialist Governments
printed.contents:
*Unplayable as an event if 'The Iron Lady' is in effect.*

Remove US Influence in Western Europe by a total of 3 Influence points, removing no more than 2 per country.

oracle.name: Fidel*
oracle.contents:
Remove all US influence from `Cuba`.

Place USSR influence in `Cuba` sufficient for control.

printed.name: Fidel*
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence in Cuba. USSR gains sufficient Influence in Cuba for Control.

oracle.name: Vietnam Revolts*
oracle.contents:
Place 2 USSR influence in `Vietnam`.

Until end of turn, the operations value of any card played by USSR is 1 greater if all its operations are performed in `Southeast Asia`.

printed.name: Vietnam Revolts*
printed.contents: Add 2 USSR Influence in Vietnam. For the remainder of the turn, the Soviet player may add 1 Operations point to any card that uses all points in Southeast Asia.

oracle.name: Blockade*
oracle.contents: USA may discard a card with an operations value of 3 or greater. If USA does not, remove all USA influence from `West Germany`.

printed.name: Blockade*
printed.contents: Unless US Player immediately discards a '3' or more value Operations card, eliminate all US Influence in West Germany.

oracle.name: Korean War*
oracle.contents:
Award USSR 2 military operations.

Roll a die and subtract 1 for each USA-controlled country adjacent to `South Korea`. If the result is 4 or greater, award 2 VP to USSR, remove all USA influence from `South Korea`, and place USSR influence there equal to the amount removed.

printed.name: Korean War*
printed.contents:
North Korea invades South Korea. Roll one die and subtract 1 for every US Controlled country adjacent to South Korea. USSR Victory on modified die roll 4-6. USSR adds 2 to Military Ops Track.

**Effects of Victory:** USSR gains 2 VP and replaces all US Influence in South Korea with USSR Influence.

oracle.name: Romanian Abdication*
oracle.contents:
Remove all USA influence from `Romania`.

Place USSR influence in `Romania` sufficient for control.

printed.name: Romanian Abdication*
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence from Romania. USSR gains sufficient Influence in Romania for Control.

oracle.name: Arab-Israeli War
oracle.contents:
Award USSR 2 military operations.

Roll a die and subtract 1 for each of `Israel` and its adjacent countries that is USA-controlled. If the result is 4 or greater, award 2 VP to USSR, remove all USA influence from `Israel`, and place USSR influence there equal to the amount removed.

*(This card instead does nothing during `065-M Camp David Accords`.)*

printed.name: Arab-Israeli War
printed.contents:
A Pan-Arab Coalition invades Israel. Roll one die and subtract 1 for US Control of Israel and every US-controlled country adjacent to Israel. USSR Victory on modified die roll 4-6. USSR adds 2 to Military Ops Track.

**Effects of Victory:** USSR gains 2 VP and replaces all US Influence in Israel with USSR Influence.

oracle.name: COMECON*
oracle.contents: Place 1 USSR influence in each of up to 4 countries in `Eastern Europe` that are not USA-controlled.

printed.name: COMECON*
printed.contents: Add 1 USSR Influence in each of four non-US Controlled countries in Eastern Europe.

oracle.name: Nasser*
oracle.contents:
Remove USA influence from `Egypt` equal to half, rounded up, of the USA influence there.

Place 2 USSR influence in `Egypt`.

printed.name: Nasser*
printed.contents: Add 2 USSR Influence in Egypt. Remove half (rounded up) of the US Influence in Egypt.

oracle.name: Warsaw Pact Formed*
oracle.contents:
Perform one (USSR's choice):
* Remove all USA influence from up to 4 countries in `Eastern Europe`.
* Place 5 USSR influence in `Eastern Europe`. Do not place more than 2 influence in any single country.

*Ongoing* — `021-E NATO` can now be resolved.

printed.name: Warsaw Pact Formed*
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence from four countries in Eastern Europe, or add 5 USSR Influence in Eastern Europe, adding no more than 2 per country. Allows play of *NATO*.

oracle.name: De Gaulle Leads France*
oracle.contents:
Remove up to 2 USA influence from `France`.

Place 1 USSR influence in `France`.

*Ongoing* — *NATO* does not apply to `France`.

printed.name: De Gaulle Leads France*
printed.contents: Remove 2 US Influence in France, add 1 USSR Influence. Cancels effects of *NATO* for France.

oracle.name: Captured Nazi Scientist*
oracle.contents: Advance your Space Race marker one step.

printed.name: Captured Nazi Scientist*
printed.contents: Advance player's Space Race marker one box.

oracle.name: Truman Doctrine*
oracle.contents: Remove all USSR influence from an uncontrolled country in `Europe`.

printed.name: Truman Doctrine*
printed.contents: Remove all USSR Influence markers in one uncontrolled country in Europe.

oracle.name: Olympic Games
oracle.contents:
Perform one (enemy's choice):
* Roll a die and add 2. The enemy rolls a die. Repeat both rolls until one side has a greater result. Award 2 VP to that side.
* Decrement DEFCON. Conduct operations with this card as though its operations value were 4.

printed.name: Olympic Games
printed.contents: Player sponsors Olympics. Opponent may participate or boycott. If Opponent participates, each player rolls one die, with the sponsor adding 2 to his roll. High roll gains 2 VP. Reroll ties. If Opponent boycotts, degrade DEFCON one level and the Sponsor may Conduct Operations as if they played a 4 Ops card.

oracle.name: NATO*
oracle.contents:
This card cannot be implemented except during `016-E Warsaw Pact Formed` or `023-E Marshall Plan`.

*Ongoing* — USSR cannot choose USA-controlled countries in `Europe` for coups, realignments, or `036-M Brush War`.

printed.name: NATO*
printed.contents:
*Play after 'Marshall Plan' or 'Warsaw Pact.'*

USSR player may no longer make Coup or Realignment rolls in any US Controlled countries in Europe.

US Controlled countries in Europe may not be attacked by play of the *Brush War* event.

oracle.name: Independent Reds*
oracle.contents: Choose one of `Yugoslavia`, `Romania`, `Bulgaria`, `Hungary`, or `Czechoslovakia`. Place USA influence in the chosen country sufficient to equal USSR influence there.

printed.name: Independent Reds*
printed.contents: Add sufficient US Influence in either Yugoslavia, Romania, Bulgaria, Hungary or Czechoslovakia to equal USSR Influence.

oracle.name: Marshall Plan*
oracle.contents:
Place 1 USA influence in each of up to 7 countries in `Western Europe` that are not USSR-controlled.

*Ongoing* — `021-E NATO` can not be resolved.

printed.name: Marshall Plan*
printed.contents:
Allows play of *NATO*.

Add one US Influence in each of seven non-USSR Controlled Western European countries.

oracle.name: Indo-Pakistani War
oracle.contents:
Gain 2 military operations.

Choose `India` or `Pakistan`.

Roll a die and subtract 1 for each enemy-controlled country adjacent to the chosen country. If the result is 4 or greater, gain 2 VP, remove all enemy influence from the chosen country, and place friendly influence there equal to the amount removed.

printed.name: Indo-Pakistani War
printed.contents:
India or Pakistan invades the other (player's choice). Roll one die and subtract 1 for every opponent-controlled country adjacent to the target of the invasion. Player Victory on modified die roll of 4-6. Player adds 2 to Military Ops Track.

**Effects of Victory:** Player gains 2 VP and replaces all opponent's Influence in target country with his Influence.

oracle.name: Containment*
oracle.contents: Until end of turn, the operations value of any card played by USA is 1 greater. A card's operations value cannot exceed 4 in this way.

printed.name: Containment*
printed.contents: All further Operations cards played by US this turn add one to their value (to a maximum of 4).

oracle.name: CIA Created*
oracle.contents:
Until end of turn, USSR plays with its hand revealed.

USA conducts operations with this card.

printed.name: CIA Created*
printed.contents:
USSR reveals hand this turn.

Then the US may Conduct Operations as if they played a 1 Op card.

oracle.name: US-Japan Mutual Defense Pact*
oracle.contents:
Place USA influence in `Japan` sufficient for control.

*Ongoing* — USSR cannot choose `Japan` for coups or realignments.

printed.name: US-Japan Mutual Defense Pact*
printed.contents:
US gains sufficient Influence in Japan for Control.

USSR may no longer may Coup or Realignment rolls in Japan.

oracle.name: Suez Crisis*
oracle.contents: Remove up to 4 USA influence from `France`, the `United Kingdom`, and `Israel`. Do not remove more than 2 from any single country.

printed.name: Suez Crisis*
printed.contents: Remove a total of 4 US Influence from France, the United Kingdom and Israel. Remove no more than 2 Influence per country.

oracle.name: East European Unrest
oracle.contents:
Remove 1 USSR influence from each of up to 3 countries in `Eastern Europe`.

If it is the Late War, instead remove up to 2 USSR influence from those countries.

printed.name: East European Unrest
printed.contents:
**In Early or Mid War:** Remove 1 USSR Influence from three countries in Eastern Europe.

**In Late War:** Remove 2 USSR Influence from three countries in Eastern Europe.

oracle.name: Decolonization
oracle.contents: Place 1 USSR influence in each of up to 4 countries in `Africa` or `Southeast Asia`.

printed.name: Decolonization
printed.contents: Add one USSR Influence in each of any four African and/or SE Asian countries.

oracle.name: Red Scare—Purge
oracle.contents: Until end of turn, the operations value of any card played by the enemy is 1 less. A card's operations value cannot be reduced below 1 in this way.

printed.name: Red Scare—Purge
printed.contents: All further Operations cards played by your opponent this turn are -1 to their value (to a minimum value of 1 Op).

oracle.name: UN Intervention
oracle.contents:
If this card is a headline, it does nothing.

Otherwise, discard a card aligned with the enemy. Conduct operations with that card.

*(That card is not resolved. Neutral cards are aligned with neither side.)*

printed.name: UN Intervention
printed.contents: Play this card simultaneously with a card containing your opponent's associated Event. The Event is canceled, but you may use its Operations value to Conduct Operations. The canceled event card returns to the discard pile. May not be played during headline phase.

oracle.name: De-Stalinization*
oracle.contents:
Choose any number of countries. Remove up to 4 USSR influence from among them.

Place USSR influence equal to the amount removed, divided among any number of countries not USA-controlled. Do not place more than 2 influence in any single country.

printed.name: De-Stalinization*
printed.contents:
USSR may relocate up to 4 Influence points to non-US controlled countries.

No more than 2 influence may be placed in the same country.

oracle.name: Nuclear Test Ban
oracle.contents:
Gain VP equal to DEFCON minus 2.

Increment DEFCON twice.

printed.name: Nuclear Test Ban
printed.contents: Player earns VPs equal to current DEFCON level minus 2, then improve DEFCON two levels.

oracle.name: Formosan Resolution*
oracle.contents:
*Ongoing* — When `Asia` is scored, if `Taiwan` is USA-controlled, `Taiwan` is a battleground during that scoring.

*(`Taiwan` is not a battleground at any other time.)*

*(`006-E The China Card` can end `035-E Formosan Resolution`.)*

printed.name: Formosan Resolution*
printed.contents: Taiwan shall be treated as a Battleground country for scoring purposes, if the US controls Taiwan when the Asia Scoring Card is played or during Final Scoring at the end of Turn 10. Taiwan is not a Battleground country for any other game purpose. This card is discarded after US play of *The China Card*.

oracle.name: Brush War
oracle.contents:
Gain 3 military operations.

Choose a country with stability less than 3. Roll a die and subtract 1 for each enemy-controlled country adjacent to the chosen country. If the result is 4 or greater, gain 1 VP, remove all enemy influence from the chosen country, and place friendly influence there equal to the amount removed.

printed.name: Brush War
printed.contents: Attack any country with a stability of 1 or 2. Roll a die and subtract 1 for every adjacent enemy controlled country. Success on 3-6. Player adds 3 to his Military OPs Track.

oracle.name: Central America Scoring
oracle.contents: Score `Central America`.

oracle.name: Southeast Asia Scoring*
oracle.contents: Score `Southeast Asia`.

oracle.name: Arms Race
oracle.contents:
If the active side's MilOps marker is ahead of its enemy's, award the active side 1 VP.

If the active side's MilOps marker is ahead of its enemy's and is on a step that meets or exceeds DEFCON in value, award that side 2 additional VP.

printed.name: Arms Race
printed.contents: Compare each player's status on the Military Operations Tracks. If Phasing Player has more MIlitary Operations points, he scores 1 VP. If Phasing Player has more Military Operations points *and* has met the Required Military Operations amount, he scores 3 VP instead.

oracle.name: Cuban Missile Crisis*
oracle.contents:
Set DEFCON to 2.

Until end of turn, if the enemy launches a coup, that side loses the game.

Until end of turn, at any time, USSR may remove 2 friendly influence from `Cuba` and USA may remove 2 friendly influence from either `West Germany` or `Turkey`; if either side removes friendly influence this way, all of this card's effects end.

printed.name: Cuban Missile Crisis*
printed.contents: Set DEFCON to Level 2. Any further Coup attempt by your opponent this turn, anywhere on the board, will result in Global Thermonuclear War. Your opponent will lose the game. This event may be canceled at any time if the USSR player removes two Influence from Cuba or the US player removes 2 Influence from either West Germany or Turkey.

oracle.name: Nuclear Subs*
oracle.contents:
Until end of turn, when USA launches a coup in a battleground, do not decrement DEFCON.

*(This does not prevent USA from losing the game to `040-M Cuban Missile Crisis`.)*

printed.name: Nuclear Subs*
printed.contents: US Coup attempts in Battleground Countries do not affect the DEFCON tract for the remainder of the turn (does not affect *Cuban Missile Crisis*).

oracle.name: Quagmire*
oracle.contents:
End the effects of `106-E NORAD`.

*Ongoing* — USA may only play scoring cards or cards from hand with operations values of 2 or greater. If USA has no such cards in hand, USA must choose to play no card in an action round.

*Ongoing* — Whenever USA plays a card with an operations value, instead of choosing a use for that card, USA discards it and rolls a die. On a result of 4 or less, all of this card's effects end.

*(Discarded cards are not resolved.)*

printed.name: Quagmire*
printed.contents: On next action round, US player must discard an Operations card worth 2 or more *and* roll 1-4 to cancel this event. Repeat each US player Action round until successful or no appropriate cards remain. If out of appropriate cards, the US player may only play scoring cards until the next turn.

oracle.name: SALT Negotiations*
oracle.contents:
Increment DEFCON twice.

Choose a card in the discard pile and add it to your hand.

Until end of turn, when any side launches a coup, subtract 1 from that side's die roll.

printed.name: SALT Negotiations*
printed.contents:
Improve DEFCON two levels.

Further Coup attempts incur -1 die roll modifier for both players for the remainder of the turn.

Player may sort through discard pile and reclaim one non-scoring card, after revealing it to their opponent.

oracle.name: Bear Trap*
oracle.contents:
*Ongoing* — USSR may only play scoring cards or cards from hand with operations values of 2 or greater. If USSR has no such cards in hand, USSR must choose to play no card in an action round.

*Ongoing* — Whenever USSR plays a card with an operations value, instead of choosing a use for that card, USSR discards it and rolls a die. On a result of 4 or less, all of this card's effects end.

*(Discarded cards are not resolved.)*

printed.name: Bear Trap*
printed.contents: On next action round, USSR player must discard an Operations card worth 2 or more *and* roll 1-4 to cancel this event. Repeat each USSR player Action Round until successful or no appropriate cards remain. If out of appropriate cards, the USSR player may only play scoring cards until the next turn.

oracle.name: Summit
oracle.contents:
Each side rolls a die and adds 1 for each region other than `Western Europe`, `Eastern Europe`, and `Southeast Asia` in which it has domination or control.

If either side's result is greater, award that side 2 VP and that side may increment or decrement DEFCON up to once.

printed.name: Summit
printed.contents: Both players roll a die. Each adds 1 for each Region they Dominate or Control. High roller gains 2 VP and may move DEFCON marker one level in either direction. Do not reroll ties.

oracle.name: How I Learned to Stop Worrying*
oracle.contents:
Gain 5 military operations.

Move the DEFCON marker to any step of the DEFCON track.

printed.name: How I Learned to Stop Worrying*
printed.contents: Set the DEFCON at any level you want (1-5). This event counts as 5 Military Operations for the purpose of required Military Operations.

oracle.name: Junta
oracle.contents:
Place 2 influence in a country in `Central America` or `South America`.

Choose a country in `Central America` or `South America`; you may launch a coup in that country using this card, but you gain no military operations.

printed.name: Junta
printed.contents:
Place 2 Influence in any one Central or South American country.

Then you may make a free Coup attempt or Realignment roll in one of these regions (using this card's Operations Value).

oracle.name: Kitchen Debates*
oracle.contents: If USA controls more battlegrounds than USSR, award USA 2 VP.

printed.name: Kitchen Debates*
printed.contents: If the US controls more Battleground countries than the USSR, poke opponent in chest and gain 2 VP!

oracle.name: Missile Envy
oracle.contents:
The enemy chooses a card from among the cards in its hand which have the greatest operations value. If the chosen card is aligned with the enemy, you conduct operations with that card. Otherwise, you resolve that card.

Then, put this card in the enemy's hand. The enemy must choose to play this card the next time they complete an action round. The enemy must choose to conduct operations with this card when they play it.

printed.name: Missile Envy
printed.contents:
Exchange this card for your opponent's highest valued Operations card in his hand. If two or more cards are tied, opponent chooses.

If the exchanged card contains your event, or an event applicable to both players, it occurs immediately. If it contains opponent's event, use Operations value without triggering event. Opponent must use this card for Operations during his next action round.

oracle.name: We Will Bury You*
oracle.contents:
Decrement DEFCON.

When USA next plays a card in an action round, unless that card is `032-E UN Intervention` and USA chooses to resolve it, award USSR 3 VP.

printed.name: We Will Bury You*
printed.contents:
Unless *UN Intervention* is played as an Event on the US player's next round, USSR gains 3 VP prior to any US VP award.

Degrade DEFCON one level.

oracle.name: Brezhnev Doctrine*
oracle.contents: Until end of turn, the operations value of any card played by USSR is 1 greater. A card's operations value cannot exceed 4 in this way.

printed.name: Brezhnev Doctrine*
printed.contents: All further Operations cards played by the USSR this turn increase their OPs value by one (to a maximum of 4).

oracle.name: Portuguese Empire Crumbles*
oracle.contents: Place 2 USSR influence in each of `SE African States` and `Angola`.

printed.name: Portuguese Empire Crumbles*
printed.contents: Add 2 USSR Influence in both the SE African States and Angola.

oracle.name: South African Unrest
oracle.contents:
Place 1 USSR influence in `South Africa`.

Perform one (USSR's choice):
* Place 1 USSR influence in `South Africa`.
* Place 2 USSR influence divided among any number of countries adjacent to `South Africa`.

printed.name: South African Unrest
printed.contents: USSR either adds 1 Influence in South Africa or adds 1 Influence in South Africa and 2 Influence in any countries adjacent to South Africa.

oracle.name: Allende*
oracle.contents: Place 2 USSR influence in `Chile`.

printed.name: Allende*
printed.contents: USSR receives 2 Influence in Chile.

oracle.name: Willy Brandt*
oracle.contents:
Award USSR 1 VP.

Place 1 USSR influence in `West Germany`.

*Ongoing* — *NATO* does not apply to `West Germany`.

*(This card instead does nothing during `096-L Tear Down This Wall`.)*

*(`096-L Tear Down This Wall` ends this event.)*

printed.name: Willy Brandt*
printed.contents:
USSR gains 1 VP.

USSR receives 1 Influence in West Germany.

Cancels *NATO* for West Germany.

*This event unplayable and/or canceled by 'Tear Down This Wall.'*

oracle.name: Muslim Revolution
oracle.contents:
Choose 2 of `Sudan`, `Iran`, `Iraq`, `Egypt`, `Libya`, `Saudi Arabia`, and `Jordan`.

Remove all USA influence from the chosen countries.

*(This card instead does nothing during `110-L AWACS Sale to Saudis`.)*

printed.name: Muslim Revolution
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence in two of the following countries: Sudan, Iran, Iraq, Egypt, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Syria, Jordan.

oracle.name: ABM Treaty
oracle.contents:
Increment DEFCON.

Conduct operations with this card.

printed.name: ABM Treaty
printed.contents:
Improve DEFCON one level.

Then player may Conduct Operations as if they played a 4 Ops card.

oracle.name: Cultural Revolution*
oracle.contents:
If USSR holds `006-E The China Card`, award USSR 1 VP.

USSR now holds `006-E The China Card`. Turn it faceup if it was taken from USA.

printed.name: Cultural Revolution*
printed.contents: If the US has *The China Card*, claim it face up and available for play. If the USSR already has it, USSR gains 1 VP.

oracle.name: Flower Power*
oracle.contents:
*Ongoing* — When USA resolves a war card, award USSR 2 VP.

*(The war cards are `011-E`, `013-E`, `024-E`, `036-M`, and `102-L`.)*

*(This card instead does nothing during `097-L An Evil Empire`.)*

*(`097-L An Evil Empire` ends this event.)*

printed.name: Flower Power*
printed.contents:
USSR gains 2 VP for every subsequently US played "war card" (played as an event or Operations) unless played on the space race. War Cards: *Arab-Israeli War, Korean War, Brush War, Indo-Pakistani War or Iran-Iraq War.*

*This event canceled by 'An Evil Empire'.*

oracle.name: U2 Incident*
oracle.contents:
Award USSR 1 VP.

Until end of turn, when either side resolves `032-E UN Intervention`, award USSR 1 VP.

printed.name: U2 Incident*
printed.contents:
USSR gains 1 VP.

If *UN Intervention* played later this turn as an Event, either by US or USSR, gain an additional 1 VP.

oracle.name: OPEC
oracle.contents:
For each of `Egypt`, `Iran`, `Libya`, `Saudi Arabia`, `Iraq`, `Gulf States`, and `Venezuela` which USSR controls, award USSR 1 VP.

*(This card instead does nothing during `086-L North Sea Oil`.)*

printed.name: OPEC
printed.contents:
USSR gains 1 VP for each of the following countries he controls:

Egypt, Iran, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Gulf States, and Venezuela.

*Unplayable as an event if 'North Sea Oil' is in effect.*

oracle.name: Lone Gunman*
oracle.contents:
USA declares each card in its hand.

USSR conducts operations with this card.

printed.name: Lone Gunman*
printed.contents:
US Player reveals his hand.

Then the USSR may Conduct Operations as if they played a 1 Op card.

oracle.name: Colonial Rear Guards
oracle.contents: Place 1 USA influence in each of up to 4 countries in `Africa` or `Southeast Asia`.

printed.name: Colonial Rear Guards
printed.contents: Add 1 US Influence in each of four different African and/or Southeast Asian countries.

oracle.name: Panama Canal Returned*
oracle.contents: Place 1 USA influence in each of `Panama`, `Costa Rica`, and `Venezuela`.

printed.name: Panama Canal Returned*
printed.contents: Add 1 US Influence in Panama, Costa Rica, and Venezuela.

oracle.name: Camp David Accords*
oracle.contents:
Award USA 1 VP.

Place 1 USA influence in each of `Israel`, `Jordan`, and `Egypt`.

*Ongoing* — `013-E Arab-Israeli War` does nothing.

printed.name: Camp David Accords*
printed.contents:
US gains 1 VP.

US receives 1 Influence in Israel, Jordan and Egpyt.

*'Arab-Israeli War' event no longer playable.*

oracle.name: Puppet Governments*
oracle.contents: Place 1 USA influence in each of up to 3 countries which contain no influence.

printed.name: Puppet Governments*
printed.contents: US may add 1 Influence in three countries that currently contain no Influence from either power.

oracle.name: Grain Sales to Soviets
oracle.contents:
USSR chooses a card in its hand at random and declares it.

Perform one (USA's choice):
* USA plays the declared card.
* USA conducts operations with this card.

printed.name: Grain Sales to Soviets
printed.contents: Randomly choose one card from USSR hand. Play it or return it. If Soviet player has no card, or returned, use this card to conduct Operations normally.

oracle.name: John Paul II Elected Pope*
oracle.contents:
Remove 2 USSR influence from `Poland`, then place 1 USA influence there.

*Ongoing* — `101-L Solidarity` can now be resolved.

printed.name: John Paul II Elected Pope*
printed.contents:
Remove 2 USSR Influence in Poland and then add 1 US Influence in Poland.

*Allows play of 'Solidarity'.*

oracle.name: Latin American Death Squads
oracle.contents:
Until end of turn, when you launch a coup in a country in `Central America` or `South America`, add 1 to the die roll.

Until end of turn, when the enemy launches a coup in a country in `Central America` or `South America`, subtract 1 from the die roll.

printed.name: Latin American Death Squads
printed.contents: All of the player's Coup attempts in Central and South America are +1 for the remainder of the turn, while all opponent's Coup attempts are -1 for the remainder of the turn.

oracle.name: OAS Founded*
oracle.contents: Place 2 USA influence in any combination of countries in `Central America` and `South America`.

printed.name: OAS Founded*
printed.contents: Add 2 US Influence in Central America and/or South America.

oracle.name: Nixon Plays the China Card*
oracle.contents:
If USA holds `006-E The China Card`, award USA 2 VP.

USA now holds `006-E The China Card`. Turn it facedown if it was taken from USSR.

printed.name: Nixon Plays the China Card*
printed.contents: If US has *The China Card*, gain 2 VP. Otherwise, US player receives *The China Card* now, face down and unavailable for immediate play.

oracle.name: Sadat Expels Soviets*
oracle.contents: Remove all USSR influence from `Egypt`, then place 1 USA influence there.

printed.name: Sadat Expels Soviets*
printed.contents: Remove all USSR Influence in Egypt and add one US Influence.

oracle.name: Shuttle Diplomacy
oracle.contents:
When either `Asia` or the `Middle East` is scored, if Final Scoring is not ongoing, USA chooses a USSR-controlled battleground in that region. Score the region as though the chosen country did not exist. Then discard this card.

*(From the time this card is resolved until this card instructs that it is to be discarded, instead of discarding it, place it faceup in front of USA.)*

printed.name: Shuttle Diplomacy
printed.contents: Play in front of US player. During the next scoring of the Middle East or Asia (whichever comes first), subtract one Battleground country from USSR total, then put this card in the discard pile. Does not count for Final Scoring at the end of Turn 10.

oracle.name: The Voice of America
oracle.contents: Remove 4 USSR influence from any combination of countries not in `Europe`. Do not remove more than 2 influence from any single country.

printed.name: The Voice of America
printed.contents: Remove 4 USSR Influence from non-European countries. No more than 2 may be removed from any one country.

oracle.name: Liberation Theology
oracle.contents: Place 3 USSR influence in `Central America`. Do not place more than 2 influence in any single country.

printed.name: Liberation Theology
printed.contents: Add 3 USSR Influence in Central America, no more than 2 per country.

oracle.name: Ussuri River Skirmish*
oracle.contents:
If USA holds `006-E The China Card`, place 4 USA influence in `Asia`. Do not place more than 2 influence in any single country.

USA now holds `006-E The China Card`. Turn it faceup if it was taken from USSR.

printed.name: Ussuri River Skirmish*
printed.contents: If the USSR has *The China Card*, claim it face up and available for play. If the US already has *The China Card*, add 4 US Influence in Asia, no more than 2 per country.

oracle.name: Ask Not What Your Country Can Do For You*
oracle.contents: USA chooses any number of cards in its hand. USA discards those cards, then draws a number of cards equal to the number discarded this way.

printed.name: Ask Not What Your Country Can Do For You*
printed.contents: US player may discard up to entire hand (including Scoring cards) and draw replacements from the deck. The number of cards discarded must be decided prior to drawing any replacements.

oracle.name: Alliance for Progress*
oracle.contents: For each USA-controlled battleground in `Central America` or `South America`, award USA 1 VP.

printed.name: Alliance for Progress*
printed.contents: US gains 1 VP for each US controlled Battleground country in Central America and South America.

oracle.name: Africa Scoring
oracle.contents: Score `Africa`.

oracle.name: One Small Step
oracle.contents: If your Space Race marker is behind the enemy's, advance your Space Race marker twice. Do not claim any VP award for the first of these advances.

printed.name: One Small Step
printed.contents: If you are behind on the Space Race track, play this card to move your marker two boxes forward on the Space Race Track, gaining the VP value of the second box only.

oracle.name: South America Scoring
oracle.contents: Score `South America`.

oracle.name: Iranian Hostage Crisis*
oracle.contents:
Remove all USA influence from `Iran`, then place 2 USSR influence there.

*Ongoing* — If USA would choose and discard a card due to the effects of `092-L Terrorism`, USA chooses and discards 2 cards instead.

printed.name: Iranian Hostage Crisis*
printed.contents:
Remove all US Influence in Iran. Add 2 USSR Influence in Iran.

Doubles effect of *Terrorism* card against US.

oracle.name: The Iron Lady*
oracle.contents:
Award USA 1 VP. Remove all USSR influence from `U.K.`.

Place 1 USSR influence in `Argentina`.

*Ongoing* — `007-E Socialist Governments` does nothing.

printed.name: The Iron Lady*
printed.contents:
US gains 1 VP.

Add 1 USSR Influence in Argentina. Remove all USSR Influence from UK.

*Socialist Governments* event no longer playable.

oracle.name: Reagan Bombs Libya*
oracle.contents: Award USA an amount of VP equal to half the USSR influence in `Libya`, rounded down.

printed.name: Reagan Bombs Libya*
printed.contents: US gains 1 VP for every 2 USSR influence in Libya.

oracle.name: Star Wars
oracle.contents: If USA's Space Race marker is ahead of USSR's, USA chooses a card in the discard pile other than a scoring card and resolves that card.

printed.name: Star Wars
printed.contents: If the US is ahead on the Space Race track, play this card to search through the discard pile for a non-scoring card of your choice. Event occurs immediately.

oracle.name: North Sea Oil*
oracle.contents:
USA must complete 8 action rounds this turn. In its 8th action round, USA may decline to play a card.

*Ongoing* — `061-M OPEC` does nothing.

printed.name: North Sea Oil*
printed.contents:
*OPEC* event is no longer playable.

US may play 8 cards this turn.

oracle.name: The Reformer*
oracle.contents:
Perform one (USSR's choice):
* Place 4 USSR influence in `Europe`.
* If USSR has more VP than USA, place 6 USSR influence in `Europe`.

Do not place more than 2 influence in a single country.

*Ongoing* — USSR may not choose any country in `Europe` when launching a coup.

*Ongoing* — After USSR resolves `090-L Glasnost`, USSR may spread influence or perform realignments with that card.

printed.name: The Reformer*
printed.contents:
Add 4 Influence in Europe (no more than 2 per country). If USSR is ahead of US in VP, then 6 Influence may be added instead.

USSR may no longer conduct Coup attempts in Europe.

*Improves effect of 'Glasnost' event.*

oracle.name: Marine Barracks Bombing*
oracle.contents:
Remove all USA influence from `Lebanon`.

Remove 2 USA influence from the `Middle East`.

printed.name: Marine Barracks Bombing*
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence in Lebanon plus remove 2 additional US Influence from anywhere in the Middle East.

oracle.name: Soviets Shoot Down KAL-007*
oracle.contents:
Decrement DEFCON, then award USA 2 VP.

If `South Korea` is USA-controlled, USA may spread influence or perform realignments with this card.

printed.name: Soviets Shoot Down KAL-007*
printed.contents:
Degrade DEFCON one level. US gains 2 VP.

If South Korea is US Controlled, then the US may place Influence or attempt Realignments as if they played a 4 Ops card.

oracle.name: Glasnost*
oracle.contents:
Increment DEFCON, then award USSR 2 VP.

*(`087-L The Reformer` allows USSR to spread influence or perform realignments when this card is resolved.)*

printed.name: Glasnost*
printed.contents:
USSR gains 2 VP.

Improve DEFCON one level.

If *The Reformer* is in effect, then the USSR may place Influence or attempt Realignments as if they played a 4 Ops card.

oracle.name: Ortega Elected in Nicaragua*
oracle.contents:
Remove all USA influence from `Nicaragua`.

Choose a country adjacent to `Nicaragua`; you may launch a coup in that country using this card, but you gain no military operations.

printed.name: Ortega Elected in Nicaragua*
printed.contents: Remove all US Influence from Nicaragua. Then USSR may make one free Coup attempt (with this card's Operations value) in a country adjacent to Nicaragua.

oracle.name: Terrorism
oracle.contents:
The enemy chooses a card from its hand at random and discards that card.

*(`082-L Iranian Hostage Crisis` causes USA to discard 2 cards instead of 1.)*

printed.name: Terrorism
printed.contents:
Opponent must randomly discard one card. If played by USSR and *Iranian Hostage Crisis* is in efect, the US player must randomly discard two cards.

(Events on discard do not occur.)

oracle.name: Iran-Contra Scandal*
oracle.contents: Until end of turn, whenever either side performs a realignment, subtract 1 from the USA die roll.

printed.name: Iran-Contra Scandal*
printed.contents: All US Realignment rolls have a -1 die roll modifier for the remainder of the turn.

oracle.name: Chernobyl*
oracle.contents: USA names a region. Until end of turn, USSR may not spread influence in any country in that region.

printed.name: Chernobyl*
printed.contents: The US player may designate one Region. For the remainder of the turn the USSR may not add additional Influence to that Region by the play of Operations Points via placing Influence.

oracle.name: Latin American Debt Crisis
oracle.contents: USA may discard a card with an operations value of 3 or greater. If USA does not, USSR chooses 2 countries in `South America` and places in each chosen country influence equal to the amount of USSR influence in that country.

printed.name: Latin American Debt Crisis
printed.contents: Unless the US Player immediately discards a '3' or greater Operations card, double USSR Influence in two countries South America.

oracle.name: Tear Down This Wall*
oracle.contents:
Place 3 USA influence in `East Germany`.

USA may launch a coup or perform realignments in `Europe` using this card, ignoring DEFCON restrictions, but gains no military operations.

End `055-M Willy Brandt`.

*Ongoing* — `055-M Willy Brandt` does nothing.

printed.name: Tear Down This Wall*
printed.contents:
Cancels/prevents *Willy Brandt*.

Add 3 US Influence in East Germany.

Then US may make a free Coup attempt or Realignment rolls in Europe using this card's Ops Value.

oracle.name: An Evil Empire*
oracle.contents:
Award USA 1 VP.

End `059-M Flower Power`.

*Ongoing* — `059-M Flower Power` does nothing.

printed.name: An Evil Empire*
printed.contents:
Cancels/prevents *Flower Power*.

US gains 1 VP.

oracle.name: Aldrich Ames Remix*
oracle.contents:
Until end of turn, USA plays with its hand revealed.

USSR chooses a card from USA's hand. USA discards that card.

printed.name: Aldrich Ames Remix*
printed.contents: US player exposes his hand to USSR player for remainder of turn. USSR then chooses one card from US hand; this card is discarded.

oracle.name: Pershing II Deployed*
oracle.contents:
Award USSR 1 VP.

Remove 1 USA influence from each of up to 3 countries in `Western Europe`.

printed.name: Pershing II Deployed*
printed.contents:
USSR gains 1 VP.

Remove 1 US Influence from up to three countries in Western Europe.
